Issue.creator: christopherferris
Issue.summary: add commit sha to version for jenkins builds and -local to local builds
Issue.description: See https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/571/ as first step in adding versioning to binary. We should look to discriminating between a formal CI/Jenkins build (which we can add commit sha to version) published to dockerhub etc from a local build that might have uncommitted changes.
